alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 08 at 12:31PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CENTRAL COLORADO RIVER BASIN...FLAT TOPS...DEBEQUE TO SILT CORRIDOR...AND GORE AND ELK MOUNTAINS... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1228 PM MST, a band of heavy snow was over New Castle, or 9 miles west of Glenwood Springs moving east at 25 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Glenwood Springs around 1235 PM MST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 102 and 134. Colorado 82 between mile markers 1 and 3. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
